price: Suka ce: "Ashe, Manzanninku ba su jẽ muku da hujjõji bayyanannu ba?" Suka ce: "Na'am, sun jẽ!" Suka ce: "To, ku rõƙa." Kuma rõƙon kãfirai bai zamo ba fãce a cikin ɓata.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَوَلَمۡ تَكُ تَأۡتِيكُمۡ رُسُلُكُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰۚ قَالُواْ فَٱدۡعُواْۗ وَمَا دُعَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٍ

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
